sentence.Network_en: The output of some export crops, notably cashews, cotton, and pyrethrum, fell drastically.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几种出口农作物, 特别是腰果 、 棉花和除虫菊的产量大幅度下降.

sentence.Network_en: An insecticide derived from a plant, e . g . pyrethrum ( from Chrysanthemum flowers ).
sentence.Network_cn: 3来源于植物的杀虫剂, 例如除虫菊 ( 来源于菊花 ).

sentence.Network_en: This article draws up the pyrethrum ester insecticide.
sentence.Network_cn: 本品是拟除虫菊酯类杀虫剂.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用危险化学品安全周知卡编制导则 ... 硝酸正丙酯 n-Propyl nitrate 除虫菊 Pyrethrum 苯醌 Quinone.
这类植物过去被视为单独的一属除虫菊属(Pyrethrum)。典型种为多年生的红花除虫菊(T. coccineum)，其深玫瑰红色的.
... (Carbon tetrachloride)1，2，4，5． 四氯-3-硝基苯 (Pyrethrum) 除虫菊酯． (Hexachlorobenzene) 六氯一1，3．丁二烯.
蚊香含能杀死蚊子的除虫菊精 (pyrethrum)﹐但在燃烧蚊香时会释放出悬浮粒子 (particulate matters) 和甲醛 (formaldehyde)﹐两者都会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting pellitory): from Latin, from Greek purethron 'feverfew'. The current senses (based on the former genus name) date from the late 19th cent

means.word_mean: 1. made of dried flower heads of pyrethrum plants
2. white-flowered pyrethrum of Balkan area whose pinnate leaves are white and silky-hairy below; source of an insecticide; sometimes placed in genus Chrysanthemum
3. spring-flowering garden perennial of Asiatic origin having finely divided aromatic leaves and white to pink-purple flowers; source of an insecticide; sometimes placed in genus Chrysanthemum
